home.title: Frontend Developer specialized in UI/UX with performance focus
home.subtitle: I transform ideas into exceptional digital experiences, combining intuitive design with optimized code to create products that users truly love to use.
about.title: About me
about.description.first: Hi! I'm Maximiliano, a software developer passionate about building innovative, accessible, and user-centered digital solutions.
about.description.second: My journey in software development began in 2018, when I started creating websites out of curiosity. Since then, I've honed my skills in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, and had the opportunity to work with some of the largest software companies and corporations, contributing to the development of inclusive and functional digital products.
about.description.third: I'm constantly improving my skills and staying up to date with the latest technologies, frameworks, and best practices to build high-quality, scalable, and reliable user experiences.
about.description.fourth: In addition to my development work, I'm also a mentor and educator. I've helped create a comprehensive course covering Next.js, REST APIs, React.js, and Material UI—designed to help others learn by combining theory with real-world application.
about.description.fifth: Lately, I've been diving into the world of AI and exploring how it can enhance software development workflows—especially large language models (LLMs), agent-based tools, MCP. I believe AI will fundamentally reshape how we design, build, and collaborate in tech.
about.description.sixth: Here are a few technologies I've been working with recently:
